title: Confirm Rebar Placement
description: Before a concrete pour, an inspector must verify that the reinforcing steel (rebar) has been placed correctly according to the drawings.

tasks.description: Retrieve the structural drawing showing the rebar layout.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspector gets the correct drawing.

tasks.description: Visually inspect the placed rebar, checking for correct size, spacing, and clearance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspector performs the physical check.

tasks.description: Log the successful inspection in the quality system, which releases the hold on the concrete pour.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the passing inspection, and the supervisor is notified they can proceed with the pour.
